Adebayo Adeleke (amụrụ na ọnwa Julaị 23), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ B-Red, bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu. E gosipụtara ya na egwu abụọ sitere na abọm studio mbụ nke Davido, Omo Baba Olowo (2012)

A maara ya dị ka nwa nwanne nna Davido na hypeman, ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri naanị ya malitere na afọ 2013 site na ntọhapụ nke otu "Insane Girl"; egwu ahụ nwere olu sitere na Davido ma Shizzi mepụtara ya. N'afọ 2016, o wepụtara EP mbụ ya All the Way Up
A mụrụ ya na Atlanta, Georgia, mba United States, nwa onye omeiwu Naịjirịa bụ Ademola Adeleke, B-Red kwagara Naịjirịa ịchụso egwu dị ka ọrụ. Ọ bụ nwa nwanne nna onye na-agụ egwu Naịjirịa bụ Davido
N'ime afọ ise ya na HKN nọ, B-Red enwebeghị ike iwepụta abọm, naanị ọrụ ọ wepụtara bụ EP egwu na etiti afọ 2016

Aha ya bụ 'All The Way Up', EP ahụ nwere egwu asatọ, gụnyere egwu bonus isii, nke kachasị bụrụ egwu ndị e wepụtara tupu ha.
N'agbata afọ 2013 na afọ 2015, o weputara ọtụtụ egwu nke nwere nnukwu ikuku gụnyere "Uju" na "Cucumber" nke gosipụtara Akon
n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2019, HKN Singer na onye na-ede egwu, B-Red tụpụrụ egwu abụọ akpọrọ “E Better featuring Mavin records boss, Don Jazzy. Na “Achie” nke gosipụtara onye na-ese ihe nrite, Davido.
